geocompkg: Geocomputation with R Metapackage

Source: R/geocompkg-package.R
geocompkg-package.Rd

Supplement to the book Geocomputation with R (https://geocompr.github.io/). The packages in the Imports are required to build the first chapter of the book. The packages in Suggests are required for Part II and III.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/geocompr/geocompkg

  • https://geocompr.github.io/geocompkg/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/Robinlovelace/geocompr/issues
